click.condition: await DialogService.Confirm("Are you sure you want to reset the occurrence?")==true
click.name: RECODb.getOccurrenceByID

click.condition: ${await DialogService.Confirm("Are you sure you want to undo changes to this Claimant?") == true}
click.name: RECODb.getClaimantByID

then.code:
var recoDbGetClaimOtherPartiesResult = await RecoDb.GetClaimOtherParties(new Query() { Filter = $@"i => i.ClaimID == @0", FilterParameters = new object[] { claim.ClaimID }, OrderBy = $"DisplayOrder asc" });
            getOtherPartyList = Mapper.Map<IQueryable<ClaimOtherParty>, IList<CppOtherPartyViewModel>>(recoDbGetClaimOtherPartiesResult);

components.content:
<CppClaimantGrid PageSizeList=@PageSizes Items=@getOtherPartyList TItem="CppOtherPartyViewModel" TEntity="RecoCms6.Models.RecoDb.OtherParty" 
EntityQuery="i => i.Select(c => new OtherParty(){ ID = c.ID }).ToList()" 
UpdateOrder="@UpdateOtherPartyDisplayOrder" ReloadGrid="@ReloadOtherPartyList" 
ExcludeList="@(new List<string>(){ "OtherPartyID" })" TOpenDialog="AddOtherParty" 
DialogParameters="@(p => new Dictionary<string, object>() { { "ID", p.ID}, { "ClaimID", intClaimID }, { "OtherPartyID", p.OtherPartyID } })" 
HiddenColumns="@(new List<string>() { "OtherPartyID" })">
</CppClaimantGrid>
components.name: htmlOtherParty
label22
components.text: Is the Commission shared with another agent?

components.name: label28
components.text: Is there money outstanding with Listing brokerage or transactional lawyer to be collected?

components.text: Describe Action to ensure this has happened

components.text: Amount this claimant is claiming (net of HST)

click.condition: ${!bIsNewClaimDetail && await DialogService.Confirm("Are you sure you want to undo changes to this Claim?") == true}
click.name: RECODb.getCdpClaimDetailByClaimID

components.content:
<CppClaimantGrid PageSizeList=@PageSizes Items=@getExpertList TItem="ExpertViewModel" TEntity="RecoCms6.Models.RecoDb.Expert" 
EntityQuery="i => i.Select(c => new RecoCms6.Models.RecoDb.Expert(){ ExpertID = c.ExpertID }).ToList()" 
UpdateOrder="@UpdateExpertsDisplayOrder" ReloadGrid="@ReloadExpertList" 
ExcludeList="@(new List<string>())" TOpenDialog="AddExpert" 
DialogParameters="@(p => new Dictionary<string, object>() { { "ExpertID", p.ExpertID}, { "ClaimID", intClaimID } })" 
HiddenColumns="@(new List<string>(){ "ExpertID" })">
</CppClaimantGrid>

components.name: label0
components.text:
Note: Please consider the stage that you think this claim will be resolved at and the tasks that will need to be performed in providing us your estimate 
(e.g Initial Review and defence; discovery: mediation: trial preparation; pre-trial and trial.)

components.name: label1
components.text: Note: Based on what you know about the claim today, please provide your best estimate of what you think the claim is worth or what you would be comfortable in recommending as a settlement.

components.name: label3
components.text: (best estimate of what insurer will ultimately pay to settle this claim)

then.name: getExpertsList
then.value: ${result.Where(sp=>sp.FirmType=="Appraisers" || sp.ServiceProviderRole=="Appraiser" || sp.FirmType=="Duty of Care Experts" || sp.ServiceProviderRole=="Duty of Care Expert")}

load.name: Roles
load.value:
claimant.ClaimantID > 0 ? (await RecoDb.GetClaimantLitigationRoles())
                .Where(x => x.ClaimantID == claimant.ClaimantID)
                .Select(x => x.LitigationRole)
                .ToArray()
                : new int[] {};
